Data Types

Data Types


Data Type = Data Set + Operations

Variables


int number;


  • Declare a variable with name called number.
  • The type of number is int.
  • number refers to a location (object) in memory.
  • number is uninitialized.
  • You can assign values to number later.

Recommend


int number = 100;


number has also been initialized.

Declare vs. Define


int number = 100; is also a definition.


Any definitions are declarations.


But not all declarations are definitions.
